ComicInfo.Summary:
The penultimate chapter of The Sixth Gun comes to a close... but there might not be enough left of the world for there to be a final arc! Drake Sinclair and Becky Montcrief must make a terrible sacrifice if they hope to stop Griselda from remaking the world in her image!
